title: Magnetic soft organogel supercapacitor for energy storage

A highly magnetic stable organogel electrolyte for supercapacitors was prepared via simple esterification using polyvinyl alcohol as raw material. The organogel showed good mechanical properties and high flexibility, magnetism and...
